SEARCH
Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis

Package Interface

package Interface
This package contains the classes that run the User Interface.
  • Class
    Description
    ChooseSecretCardController
    This class is responsible for the logic of the scene where the player chooses the secret achievement card.
    ChooseStartingCardController
    This class is responsible for the logic of the scene where the player chooses the starting card face.
    ColorReadySceneController
    This class is responsible for the logic of the scene where the player chooses the color and sets ready.
    JoinSceneController
    This class is responsible for the logic of the scene where the player joins the server.
    MainBoardSceneController
    This class is responsible for the logic of the main board scene
    MainCLI
    This class is responsible for starting the CLI.
    MainGUI
    This class is responsible for starting the GUI.
    NameReadySceneController
    This class is responsible for the logic of the scene where the player chooses the name and sets ready (in order to reconnect to a game).
    NetworkSceneController
    This class is responsible for the logic of the scene where the player chooses the connection method.
    SceneController
    Abstract class for SceneController, which contains the scene logic
    SceneName
    This enum contains the names of the scenes.
    WaitingSceneController
    Class for the Waiting Scene Controller, which does nothing
